articles.description: Married At First Sight's Liam Cooper was left feeling 'absolutely betrayed' after his bride Georgia Fairweather appeared in a video of Jason Engler dissing him.
articles.content:
Married At First Sight's Liam Cooper was left feeling 'absolutely betrayed' after his bride Georgia Fairweather appeared in a video where Jason Engler made a homophobic slur against him.
